66756: Increasing staff diversity enriches our workforce culture at ALLETE. Our employees are operating in an increasingly diverse society. In order to be accountable to our employees and stakeholders, we strive to have a workforce that reflects the diversity of the communities we serve, promotes inclusivity and is equitable.

At ALLETE, we want to ensure that we have a workplace culture where we treat each other with fairness, dignity and respect. The Company has a Respect in the Workplace initiative, which includes education as well as ongoing discussions focused on building respectful relationships and managing bias. In 2020, further efforts began in crafting a framework to strengthen ALLETEâ€™s diversity, equity and inclusion efforts in the areas of: workforce, supply chain and ALLETE as a community citizen.
